description: Phase 5 Hierarchical TOON Infrastructure Complete! Implemented generic trait-based system for flattening tree structures: (1) HierarchicalToonable trait + FlatNode<T> struct with serde flatten magic, (2) TraceCallPathResult implementation with depth-first flattening via parent_id references, (3) create_hierarchical_toon_result helper with auto-mode and fallback handling. All 11 tests passing (4 trait tests, 3 flattening tests, 4 encoding tests). Ready to integrate into trace_call_path tool. Expected savings: 63% token reduction (28,800 â†’ 10,680 chars), 77% combined with Phase 4. Reusable for get_symbols and any future hierarchical data.
